show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #4, Mike Callicrate "It's time for a third revolution against monopolies"
subtitle: #4, Mike Callicrate "It's time for a third revolution against monopolies"
summary:
Mike Callicrate sat down with us to talk about all manner of things from cattle markets, to public food spaces, the Bander, his feedlot and the pathway he built to market.

He shares valuable lessons learned from fighting against the commodity production system and how he's built his own pathway to the consumer.

We talk about small community slaughter plants and public meat spaces and what that could look like going in to the future. We discuss environmental challenges, the food police and what it means when a Dollar General comes to town.

Links:
